name: The Plot (JuggaadGamingIndustry)
description: Nikolay Smirnoff is a High School Student and has an interest in exploring wildlife and new places. One day he decides to visit a village, because of the various wildlife and tribal people a few hundred miles from his town, He met new people, he wanted to know more about the tribe so he went on as asked a villager who offered him food at his place, little did he knew the guy who offered him aid was Cannibalism follower, He was taken to the villager's house who is also an archaeologist by profession. Nikolay was offered food with sleeping pills mixed into it. After having the food, Nikolay felt dizzy and fell asleep. The villager locked him in a room. Nikolay now has to escape the room and get to safety. He needs to find a key to the door. The key is hidden in the room somewhere, Nikolay needs to solve various puzzles to access the keys. After he escapes he needs to get back to his house, but does he have what it takes to survive in this unknown village with a person chasing behind his back?
